targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(uptime),
  host
FROM
  "system"
WHERE
  uptime > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(load5),
  host
FROM
  "system"
WHERE
  load5 > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(zombies),
  host
FROM
  "processes"
WHERE
  zombies > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(total),
  host
FROM
  "processes"
WHERE
  total > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(total_threads),
  host
FROM
  "processes"
WHERE
  total_threads > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(usage_idle) * -1 + 100,
  host
FROM
  "cpu"
WHERE
  usage_idle > 0
  AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(used_percent),
  host
FROM
  "mem"
WHERE
  used_percent > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(used_percent),
  host
FROM
  "swap"
WHERE
  used_percent > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(used_percent),
  host
FROM
  "disk"
WHERE
  used_percent > 0
  AND "path" = '/'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  last(usage_iowait),
  host
FROM
  "cpu"
WHERE
  usage_iowait > 0
  AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(usage_user) as user,
  avg(usage_system) as "system",
  avg(usage_softirq) as "softirq",
  avg(usage_steal) as "steal",
  avg(usage_nice) as "nice",
  avg(usage_irq) as "irq",
  avg(usage_iowait) as "iowait",
  avg(usage_guest) as "guest",
  avg(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice",
  host
FROM
  "cpu"
WHERE
  cpu = 'cpu-total'
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(load1) as short,
  avg(load5) as medium,
  avg(load15) as long,
  host
FROM
  "system"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(running) as running,
  avg(blocked) as blocked,
  avg(sleeping) as sleeping,
  avg(stopped) as stopped,
  avg(zombies) as zombies,
  avg(paging) as paging,
  avg(unknown) as unknown,
  host
FROM
  "processes"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(total) as total,
  avg(used) as used,
  avg(cached) as cached,
  avg(free) as free,
  avg(buffered) as buffered,
  host
FROM
  "mem"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(context_switches) as "context switches",
  host
FROM
  "kernel"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(processes_forked) as forks,
  host
FROM
  "kernel"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("filemax") as max,
  host
FROM
  "linux_sysctl_fs"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("total"),
  host
FROM
  "interrupts"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  "irq",
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(usage_user) as "user",
  avg(usage_system) as "system",
  avg(usage_softirq) as "softirq",
  avg(usage_steal) as "steal",
  avg(usage_nice) as "nice",
  avg(usage_irq) as "irq",
  avg(usage_iowait) as "iowait",
  avg(usage_guest) as "guest",
  avg(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"
FROM
  "cpu"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and cpu = ($cpu)
GROUP by
  timestamp

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(ip_conntrack_count),
  host
FROM
  "conntrack"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(tcp_close) as CLOSED,
  avg(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT,
  avg(tcp_closing) as CLOSING,
  avg(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED,
  avg(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1,
  avg(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2,
  avg(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK,
  avg(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV,
  avg(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT,
  avg(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT,
  host
FROM
  netstat
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP BY
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(tcp_estabresets)
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP by
  timestamp

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortOnClose") as TcpExtTCPAbortOnClose,
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortOnData") as TcpExtTCPAbortOnData,
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortOnTimeout") as TcpExtTCPAbortOnTimeout,
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortFailed") as TcpExtTCPAbortFailed,
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortOnLinger") as TcpExtTCPAbortOnLinger,
  avg("TcpExtTCPAbortOnMemory") as TcpExtTCPAbortOnMemory,
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(tcp_estabresets) as tcp_estabresets,
  avg(tcp_outrsts) as tcp_outrsts,
  avg(tcp_activeopens) as tcp_activeopens,
  avg(tcp_passiveopens) as tcp_passiveopens,
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("TcpExtSyncookiesFailed") as failed,
  avg("TcpExtSyncookiesRecv") as received,
  avg("TcpExtSyncookiesSent") as sent,
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("IcmpInEchos") as "in echos",
  avg("IcmpOutEchos") as "out echos",
  avg("IcmpInEchoReps") as "in echo responses",
  avg("IcmpOutEchoReps") as "out echo responses",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("IcmpInErrors") as "in errors",
  avg("IcmpOutErrors") as "out errors",
  avg("IcmpInCsumErrors") as "checksum errors",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("IpInDiscards") as "in discards",
  avg("IpOutDiscards") as "out discards",
  avg("IpInHdrErrors") as "in hdr errors",
  avg("IpInAddrErrors") as "in addr errors",
  avg("IpOutNoRoutes") as "out no routes",
  avg("IpInUnknownProtos") as "in unknown protocol",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("Ip6InDiscards") as "in discards",
  avg("Ip6OutDiscards") as "out discards",
  avg("Ip6InHdrErrors") as "in hdr errors",
  avg("Ip6InAddrErrors") as "in addr errors",
  avg("Ip6OutNoRoutes") as "out no routes",
  avg("Ip6InUnknownProtos") as "in unknown protocol",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(udp_indatagrams) as "in datagrams",
  avg(udp_outdatagrams) as "out datagrams",
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("UdpSndbufErrors") as "Send buffer errors",
  avg("UdpRcvbufErrors") as "Receive buffer errors",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("UdpInCsumErrors") as "checksum errors",
  avg("UdpInErrors") as "in errors",
  avg("UdpNoPorts") as "no ports",
  host
FROM
  "nstat"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(bytes_recv) * 8 as "in",
  avg(bytes_sent) * 8 as "out",
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND interface ~ ($netif)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(packets_recv) as "in",
  avg(packets_sent) as "out",
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND interface ~ ($netif)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(drop_in) as "in",
  avg(drop_out) as "out",
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND interface ~ ($netif)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(err_in) as "in",
  avg(err_out) as "out",
  host
FROM
  "net"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND interface ~ ($netif)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("in") as "in",
  avg("out") as "out",
  host
FROM
  "swap"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(used) as "used",
  avg(total) as "total",
  host
FROM
  "swap"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(reads) as "read",
  avg(writes) as "write",
  host
FROM
  "diskio"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND "name" ~ ($disk)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(read_bytes) as "read",
  avg(write_bytes) as "write",
  host
FROM
  "diskio"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND "name" ~ ($disk)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(read_time) as "read",
  avg(write_time) as "write",
  host
FROM
  "diskio"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND "name" ~ ($disk)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(total) AS "total",
  avg(used) as "used",
  host
FROM
  "disk"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND "path" ~ ($mountpoint)     AND host = ('$host')

GROUP by
  timestamp,
  path,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(inodes_used) as "used",
  avg(inodes_free) + avg(inodes_used) as "total",
  host
FROM
  "disk"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host,
  path

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("write_time_ns"),
  host
FROM
  "internal_write"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND host = ('$host')
GROUP by
  timestamp,
  host

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("gather_time_ns")
FROM
  "internal_gather"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP by
  timestamp

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg("metrics_written")
FROM
  "internal_agent"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP by
  timestamp

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
avg("gather_errors") as "Gather errors",
avg("metrics_dropped") as "Dropped metrics"

FROM
  "internal_agent"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP by
  timestamp

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT host FROM cpu order by host asc;
list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT host FROM cpu order by host asc;
